booking.title: Book Your Appointment
booking.subtitle: Professional hair services at Beloved Beauty & Hair Studio
booking.description: Professional braiding, styling, and hair care services. A €10 booking deposit is required to secure your appointment and will be applied to your final bill.
booking.termsDescription: Please read and accept our terms before proceeding
booking.thankYou: Thank you for accepting our terms and conditions. To secure your appointment, please pay the €10 booking deposit. This amount will be applied to your final bill.
booking.iHaveRead: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions
booking.selectConsent: Please select your media consent preferences above to continue.

success.thankYou: Thank you for your purchase. Your order has been confirmed and will be processed shortly.
success.emailConfirmation: You will receive an email confirmation shortly with your order details.
success.pleaseWait: Please wait while we retrieve your purchase details.

bookingSuccess.depositProcessed: Your €10 booking deposit has been processed. You'll now be redirected to complete your appointment booking.
